title: Bad Attitude
description: BAD agent Sydney Westbrook must find the perfect sniper for a risky counter-terrorism mission. J.D. Steele, a military sniper whose attitude problem landed him in prison, seems a good candidate. But as they're dragged into a secret world of freelance killers, Sydney begins to discover the man of honor and passion beneath Steele's arrogant fa√ßade. It's a man even Steele didn't know he could be -- and a man whose mission will risk the life of the only woman he's ever loved...
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon
